1.text: Measure 1⁄2 cup (120 ml) of whole milk with 1⁄2 cup (120 ml) of light cream.

2.text: Stir together 3⁄4 cup (180 ml) of whole milk and 1⁄4 cup (59 ml) of heavy cream.

3.text: Measure out 2⁄3 cup (160 ml) of skim, 1%, or 2% milk.

4.text: Melt 2 tbsp (28 g) of butter and pour it into a 1 cup (240 ml) measuring cup.

5.text: Measure out 1 cup (240 ml) of milk.

6.text: Mix equal parts coconut cream with plant-based milk to make vegan half-and-half.
